description: All Erizteya charms are made of 925 alloy, zircon and other real materials for sparkle and color.
With each new product, Erizteya strives to create beautiful jewelry designs through exquisite craftsmanship.
Each charm represents a different meaning and can be combined at will to represent every unusual commemorative moment in the bracelet owner's life. Carry your unique memory.
Avoid immersion silver liquids, polishing liquids, ultrasonic cleaning and strong chemicals
Limit contact with cosmetics, creams, fragrances and lotions
Do not wear in the shower, pool or hot tub
Store clean, dry sterling silver in a dry airtight container, such as a ziplock bag
